body.name: Zensanit 4 Pack Activated Charcoal Odor Absorber 170g/6oz - Nature Fresh Coconut Shell Air Freshener - Fragrance-Free Odor Eliminator for Home Use, Equal 16 Pack Bamboo Charcoal Air Purifying Bag
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 32 mins
features: SUPERIOR ODOR REMOVAL: Made from top-grade certified coconut shell activated charcoal(960mg/g iodine value), 400% higher adsorption capacity than bamboo charcoal(230mg/g).

LAST LONGER: To make top-notch odor eliminator for home, we package the highest quality activated carbon in a highly breathable material that maximizes airflow. 1 pack keeps shoe cabinet fresh 3+ months.
SAFE & ODORLESS: Fragrance-free, additive-free, and chemical-free, these coconut shell activated charcoal bags odor absorbers are non toxic air freshener, safe for children and pet.
MULTI-USE: Our activated charcoal deodorizer eliminates unpleasant odors in various settings, such as closets, shoes, fridges, cars, and litter boxes. Effective for strong smell.
NATURE & ECO: The entire process from raw material collection, product manufacturing and use, to waste recycling is completely environmentally friendly.
body.description: Premium Activated Carbon for Exceptional Air Fresheners Let the Results Speak for Themselves Iodine value reflects the adsorption capacity of activated carbon, a fundamental and essential performance metric. The price of activated carbon depends on its iodine value. Bamboo charcoal, with an iodine value of typically less than 300mg/g, falls below the minimum requirement for activated carbon (500mg/g). Iodine Number 960mg/g, the Top-Tier activated charcoal on the market. USA ASTM D2862, ASTM D3467, ASTM D4607, ASTM D5742 Method Tested 100% Natural ingredients, additive free. Safe for Children & Pets, no allergy risk.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Upgrade Your Odor-Removal Game Today! Introducing Zensanit - As a professional activated charcoal manufacturer & a factory-direct operation, at our factory, we don't just produce activated charcoal - we engineer powerful deodorizing products that work. We offer unbeatable quality at an affordable price. Experience the power of our GENUINE PREMIUM ACTIVATED CHARCOAL odor absorber products. Made from natural coconut shells only, our coconut shell AC solutions ensure a fresh and clean living space.

Upgrade Your Odor-Removal Game Today! Introducing Zensanit - As a professional activated charcoal manufacturer & a factory-direct operation, at our factory, we don't just produce activated charcoal - we engineer powerful deodorizing products that work. We offer unbeatable quality at an affordable price. Experience the power of our GENUINE PREMIUM ACTIVATED CHARCOAL odor absorber products. Made from natural coconut shells only, our coconut shell AC solutions ensure a fresh and clean living space.

Versatile Odor Absorber -- Remove Odor and Formaldehyde in Specific Areas Unscented Closet Air Freshener -- Keep Your Clothes Fresh Eliminate closet odors and prevent moisture with our activated charcoal deodorizing bag. Simply hang it inside and let the powerful activated charcoal do its work. The porous charcoal traps and absorbs odors while absorbing excess moisture to prevent mold and mildew growth. Keep your closet fresh and dry with our multi-functional bag. Long-Lasting Car Air Freshener -- Do More Than You Expect Not only does it eliminate unpleasant odors in your car, but it also effectively purifies the interior from harmful, odorless gases such as formaldehyde, improving the overall air quality. Our charcoal packs have a single use cycle of up to 180 days and can work even longer in low humidity conditions. Remove Strong Odor, Safe for Pet Keep your pet's living area smelling fresh and clean with our activated charcoal odor absorber. Simply place the bag in the designated area and let the activated charcoal work its magic. Remember, the closer the charcoal bag is placed to the source of the odor, the more effective it is at eliminating the smell.

What Sets Us Apart? We take pride in using our own self-produced coconut shell activated charcoal and uniquely designed packaging. Unlike those simply rebrand generic bamboo charcoal bags, we have carefully crafted our activated charcoal to offer over 4 times the comprehensive adsorption capacity and cost-efficiency compared to traditional bamboo charcoal. The TRUTH About "Recharge" Charcoal bags "recharged" in sunlight do restore some adsorption capacity. However, some sellers say that "Recharge" the charcoal bag can make it last up to 2 or even 3 years, which is totally absurd. After you have "Recharged" your charcoal bag up to 2 times, we recommend stopping using it. Both activated carbon and bamboo charcoal require extremely high temperatures to fully restore their adsorption capacity. This process CANNOT be achieved through exposure to sunlight and necessitates the use of specialized equipment. How to Dispose of Wasted Activated Charcoal? We recommend burying the discarded activated charcoal into the soil, which will make the soil more fertile. Activated Charcoal Or Baking Soda? Activated charcoal adsorbs odor molecules in micropores within itself, which is a safe physical process.Baking soda relies on chemical reactions to neutralize odor molecules, which is a safe chemical process as well.

Coconut Shell Activated Charcoal More Than You Expect Due to its superb adsorption capacity, Zensanit activated charcoal is not only used to make deodorizing charcoal packs. Let's see what else Zensanit's activated carbon can do! Water Purification Air Filters in Respirators Medicine Teeth Whitening Industrial Exhaust Treatment Premium Activated Carbon for Exceptional Air Fresheners Let the Results Speak for Themselves Iodine value reflects the adsorption capacity of activated carbon, a fundamental and essential performance metric. The price of activated carbon depends on its iodine value. Bamboo charcoal, with an iodine value of typically less than 300mg/g, falls below the minimum requirement for activated carbon (500mg/g). Iodine Number 960mg/g, the Top-Tier activated charcoal on the market. USA ASTM D2862, ASTM D3467, ASTM D4607, ASTM D5742 Method Tested 100% Natural ingredients, additive free. Safe for Children & Pets, no allergy risk.
Performance Metrics of Zensanit Activated Charcoal Iodine Number 960mg/g Methylene blue 181mg/g Carbon Tetrachloride 65% Surface Area 950m2/g Filling Density 465g/L Ash 4.33% Moisture 1.74% PH 9.0

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am smoking on the sly. Don't want anyone to know. My car does not smell like smoke because of these. Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Better than expected!!! Have a mid size car and it’s smoked in, with these u can’t even tell!!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best for Your Car!
reviews.reviewText: My car always had a musty smell especially when it would rain. I tried awful artificial air fresheners and it made it worse. These little bags are amazing. They literally take every scent out of the air so it smells like NOTHING which is EXACTLY what I wanted in my car. No artificial smells, no musty smell, no food smell, nothing. Now this is only about 1 week in so I hope they last but I'll definitely be ordering again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars No Coconut Smell, No Odor Absorption
reviews.reviewText: May have gotten an expired product, but it did not work in the slightest.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't take away cat litter box smell
reviews.reviewText: Doesn't do what its supposed to do

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really works to eliminate odors
reviews.reviewText: I love these. I have one hanging in each closet, one in the kitchen, and one hanging from the window over the cat's litter box. They worked immediately to start soaking up unwanted odors in the house. I highly recommend these. Great quality and great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Dont waste your money. They don't work, even in a small area. Nice burlap package, nice sturdy hooks to hang them with...they just seem to absorb any odors, as advertised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We use them to put in our riding helmets. A couple dips of essential oils on the bag & they work great!
